A triangle class used in meshes.

Christopher Ruff

getRayTriangleIntersection

public Vector3D getRayTriangleIntersection(Ray r)
Tests if the given ray intersects this triangle. Returns the intersection point or null if there is none.

Parameters:
r - the r
Returns:
the ray triangle intersection intersection vector

containsPoint

public boolean containsPoint(Vector3D p)
Checks if point vector is inside the triangle created by the points a, b and c. These points will create a plane and the point checked will have to be on this plane in the region between a,b,c. Note: The triangle must be defined in clockwise order a,b,c

Parameters:
p - the p
Returns:
true, if point is in triangle.

getClosestVertexTo

public Vector3D getClosestVertexTo(Vector3D p)
Finds and returns the closest point on any of the triangle edges to the point given.

Parameters:
p - point to check
Returns:
closest point

getClosestPointOnSurface

public Vector3D getClosestPointOnSurface(Vector3D p)
Computes the the point on the surface of triangle closest to the given vector. From Real-Time Collision Detection by Christer Ericson, published by Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, Copyright 2005 Elsevier Inc

Parameters:
p - the p
Returns:
closest point on triangle (result may also be one of v0, v1 or v2)

isClockwiseInXY

public boolean isClockwiseInXY()
Checks if is clockwise in xy.

true, if is clockwise in xy
